name: Let's animate it! :)
description:
Play the prototype above ↑↑↑


You can click through the buttons and drag left on the list item to see different UI animations.


I explore how to morph styles and actions into different components and use UI animation on the modals and the drag to the left gesture.


UI Animation is fun. Sometimes fun can be distracting and gets in the way of the user's intention. In this file, I study the direction of motion when animating modals to see how it could sustain the user's intent, see the "Learn more" buttons. I change the direction of the animation according to the user's affirmative or declining action. Animating the list item on a left swipe, I took a closer look at the mobile gesture common for deleting emails in the inbox.
